languages.text: "Мон-кай..." {n}Друкари осекается. Вы видите, как у ксеноса сводит скулы, когда он с трудом выдавливает из себя:{/n} "...{name}. У меня есть для тебя поручение".
"Mon-keigh..." {n}begins the Drukhari, but he stops short. You see his face twist as he forces out the next words:{/n} "{name}. There is something you must do for me."
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай..." {n}Друкари осекается. Вы видите, как у ксеноса сводит скулы, когда он с трудом выдавливает из себя:{/n} "...{name}. У меня есть для тебя поручение".

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}begins the Drukhari, but he stops short. You see his face twist as he forces out the next words:{/n} "{name}. There is something you must do for me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}begins the Drukhari, but he stops short. You see his face twist as he forces out the next words:{/n} "{name}. There is something you must do for me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}begins the Drukhari, but he stops short. You see his face twist as he forces out the next words:{/n} "{name}. There is something you must do for me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}begins the Drukhari, but he stops short. You see his face twist as he forces out the next words:{/n} "{name}. There is something you must do for me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “猴子……”{n}玛拉斋开了口，但他随后就停住了。你看到他的脸扭曲着，强迫自己吐出了接下来的话。{/n}“{name}，有件事情你必须替我做。”
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}begins the Drukhari, but he stops short. You see his face twist as he forces out the next words:{/n} "{name}. There is something you must do for me."

traits.locale_text: “猴子……”{n}玛拉斋开了口，但他随后就停住了。你看到他的脸扭曲着，强迫自己吐出了接下来的话。{/n}“{name}，有件事情你必须替我做。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイ…」{n}デュカーリは口を開くが、すぐに黙り込む。そして顔を歪めると、無理やり言葉を続けた。{/n}「{name}。お前に仕事をやろう」
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}begins the Drukhari, but he stops short. You see his face twist as he forces out the next words:{/n} "{name}. There is something you must do for me."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイ…」{n}デュカーリは口を開くが、すぐに黙り込む。そして顔を歪めると、無理やり言葉を続けた。{/n}「{name}。お前に仕事をやろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Mon-keigh...», {n}empieza el drukhari, pero no termina la frase. Ves que su rostro se contrae en una mueca al obligarse a pronunciar las siguientes palabras:{/n} «{name}. Hay algo que debes hacer por mí».
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}begins the Drukhari, but he stops short. You see his face twist as he forces out the next words:{/n} "{name}. There is something you must do for me."

traits.locale_text: «Mon-keigh...», {n}empieza el drukhari, pero no termina la frase. Ves que su rostro se contrae en una mueca al obligarse a pronunciar las siguientes palabras:{/n} «{name}. Hay algo que debes hacer por mí».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Mon-keigh... » {n}lance le Drukhari avant de s'interrompre aussitôt. Son visage se tord alors qu'il se fait violence pour prononcer les mots suivants :{/n} « {name}. Il y a quelque chose que vous devez faire pour moi. »
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}begins the Drukhari, but he stops short. You see his face twist as he forces out the next words:{/n} "{name}. There is something you must do for me."

traits.locale_text: « Mon-keigh... » {n}lance le Drukhari avant de s'interrompre aussitôt. Son visage se tord alors qu'il se fait violence pour prononcer les mots suivants :{/n} « {name}. Il y a quelque chose que vous devez faire pour moi. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Chem-Pan-Sey ...", {n}beginnt der Drukhari, hält dann aber inne. Du erkennst, wie sich sein Gesicht verzieht, während er folgende Worte herauszwingt:{/n} "{name}. Ihr müsst etwas für mich erledigen."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}begins the Drukhari, but he stops short. You see his face twist as he forces out the next words:{/n} "{name}. There is something you must do for me."

traits.locale_text: "Chem-Pan-Sey ...", {n}beginnt der Drukhari, hält dann aber inne. Du erkennst, wie sich sein Gesicht verzieht, während er folgende Worte herauszwingt:{/n} "{name}. Ihr müsst etwas für mich erledigen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}begins the Drukhari, but he stops short. You see his face twist as he forces out the next words:{/n} ". There is something you must do for me."

languages.text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}Drukhari, cümleye başladıktan hemen sonra duraksıyor. Kelimeler ağzından zorla çıkarken yüzünün buruştuğunu görüyorsun.{/n} "{name}. Benim için bir şey yapman gerek."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}begins the Drukhari, but he stops short. You see his face twist as he forces out the next words:{/n} "{name}. There is something you must do for me."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh..." {n}Drukhari, cümleye başlamasından hemen sonra duraksıyor. Kelimeler ağzından zorla çıkarken yüzünün buruştuğunu görüyorsun.{/n} "{name}. Benim için bir şey yapman gerek."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
